byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and LIZ ALDERMAN

abstract: As the dismantling of Dexia started to take shape with sale talks for the Luxembourg unit, French and Belgian officials met to hash out the broader break-up.
snippet: As the dismantling of Dexia started to take shape with sale talks for the Luxembourg unit, French and Belgian officials met to hash out the broader break-up.

headline.main: Breakup Proposals for Dexia Begin to Emerge
headline.print_headline: Breakup Proposals for Dexia Beginning to Emerge
